title: Easy Creamy Pasta Recipe
directions: Over Medium Heat - Melt butter and add garlic in a medium sauce pan. Cook the pasta during this time
Add flour cook for 1 minute - keep stirring
Stir in broth and milk and cook - keep stirring till it is thicken --- take a while
Add parsley, salt, pepper and cheese.
Stir until cheese is melted add tomatoes
ingredients: ½ Pint of Tomatoes - Cut in Half
